snippet: Alex Rodriguez will be in the lineup and be playing third base while Derek Jeter, who had started 155-straight playoff games at shortstop, will still be leading off but as the designated hitter.
abstract: Alex Rodriguez will be in the lineup and be playing third base while Derek Jeter, who had started 155-straight playoff games at shortstop, will still be leading off but as the designated hitter.

headline.main: Rodriguez Batting Fifth; Jeter Designated Hitter for Game 4
